verses.verse: (For the choir director; according to Jeduthun. A Psalm of David.) My soul <S%H5315><s%> [waits] in silence <S%H1747><s%> for God <S%H430><s%> only; <S%H389><s%> From Him is my salvation. <S%H3444><s%>
He only <S%H389><s%> is my rock <S%H6697><s%> and my salvation, <S%H3444><s%> My stronghold; <S%H4869><s%> I shall not be greatly <S%H7227><s%> shaken. <S%H4131><s%>

How <S%H575><s%> long <S%H5704><s%> will you assail <S%H9095><s%> a man, <S%H376><s%> That you may murder <S%H7523><s%> [him,] all <S%H3605><s%> of you, Like a leaning <S%H5186><s%> wall, <S%H1447><s%> like a tottering <S%H1760><s%> fence <S%H1447><s%>?

They have counseled <S%H3289><s%> only <S%H389><s%> to thrust <S%H5080><s%> him down <S%H5080><s%> from his high <S%H7613><s%> position; <S%H7613><s%> They delight <S%H7521><s%> in falsehood; <S%H3577><s%> They bless <S%H1288><s%> with their mouth, <S%H6310><s%> But inwardly <S%H7130><s%> they curse. <S%H7043><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
My soul, <S%H5315><s%> wait <S%H1826><s%> in silence <S%H1826><s%> for God <S%H430><s%> only, <S%H389><s%> For my hope <S%H8615><s%> is from Him.
He only <S%H389><s%> is my rock <S%H6697><s%> and my salvation, <S%H3444><s%> My stronghold; <S%H4869><s%> I shall not be shaken. <S%H4131><s%>
On God <S%H430><s%> my salvation <S%H3468><s%> and my glory <S%H9202><s%> [rest]; The rock <S%H6697><s%> of my strength, <S%H5797><s%> my refuge <S%H4268><s%> is in God. <S%H430><s%>

Trust <S%H982><s%> in Him at all <S%H3605><s%> times, <S%H6256><s%> O people; <S%H5971><s%> Pour <S%H8210><s%> out your heart <S%H3824><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Him; God <S%H430><s%> is a refuge <S%H4268><s%> for us. Selah. <S%H5542><s%>

Men <S%H1121><s%> <S%H120><s%> of low <S%H1121><s%> <S%H120><s%> degree <S%H1121><s%> <S%H120><s%> are only <S%H389><s%> vanity, <S%H1892><s%> and men <S%H1121><s%> <S%H376><s%> of rank <S%H376><s%> are a lie; <S%H3577><s%> In the balances <S%H3976><s%> they go <S%H5927><s%> up; They are together <S%H3162><s%> lighter than <S%H4480><s%> breath. <S%H1892><s%>

Do not trust <S%H982><s%> in oppression, <S%H6233><s%> And do not vainly <S%H1891><s%> hope <S%H1891><s%> in robbery; <S%H1498><s%> If <S%H3588><s%> riches <S%H2428><s%> increase, <S%H5107><s%> do not set <S%H7896><s%> [your] heart <S%H3820><s%> [upon them.]
Once <S%H259><s%> God <S%H430><s%> has spoken; <S%H1696><s%> Twice <S%H8147><s%> I have heard <S%H8085><s%> this: <S%H2098><s%> That power <S%H5797><s%> belongs to God; <S%H430><s%>
And lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> is Thine, O Lord, <S%H136><s%> For Thou dost recompense <S%H9608><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> according to his work. <S%H4639><s%>
